mapper.insert: insert into employee_profiles (employee_id, company_id, user_id, employee_code, employee_name, employee_email, employee_phone, job_title, manager_user_id, department_id, start_date, work_location, status, created_at, updated_at ) values (#{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{workLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update employee_profiles set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_code = #{employeeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_name = #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_email = #{employeeEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_phone = #{employeePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_title = #{jobTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_user_id = #{managerUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, work_location = #{workLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select employee_id, company_id, user_id, employee_code, employee_name, employee_email, employee_phone, job_title, manager_user_id, department_id, start_date, work_location, status, created_at, updated_at from employee_profiles where employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select employee_id, company_id, user_id, employee_code, employee_name, employee_email, employee_phone, job_title, manager_user_id, department_id, start_date, work_location, status, created_at, updated_at from employee_profiles
